entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 8:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: SSE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 late this evening except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. 70 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
